page.title: 19Rec.Sports in Ardleigh
page.content: {Football}and{Cricket}are played on the{Village "Rec". Badminton}and {Aerobics}for{ladies}take place in the {Village Hall.}These are mostly for Ardleigh people. {The Ardleigh Squash Club,}managed by Chris Harris is thirteen years old, has about 500 members ,children , men and women.{The children}start about 7 years old. One,{Del Harris, is now {the Under 16 World Champion. The{Ardleigh Team}is the{only one}in {East Anglia}to play in the{Premier {league. Ahmed Safwat}is the{coach}and profesional player. Barry Rotheiy coaches lady players. Famous players include{Phil Kenyon ,Qayin Brawars {and{Hiddy Jahan. { The club}has 6 squash courts, 2 exhibition courts, 2 tennis courts, fitness equipment,solarium,jacuzzi, snooker room and restaurant.
